messages.zh: 为了攀爬个观测点，都要解决那么多整合运动......
messages.en: Even just climbing for an observation point, needs to take out so many Reunion Movement……

messages.zh: （这么多整合运动......全都是陈长官一个人打倒的吗？！）
messages.en: (So many Reunion Movement……are they all beaten by officer Ch’en?!)
We need to prioritize the mission now.
The Guard Bureau is guarding entrance

messages.zh: ......如果不是我来带队，近卫局将很难开展搜查任务。
messages.en: ……If not led by me, it’d be hard for the Guard Bureau to start searching.
Is more complex than I expected.

messages.zh: 依照现状，独自深入的代价太大了。
messages.en: Judging from the look now, the price is too high to go in alone.

messages.zh: 陈长官，罗德岛也希望你能够暂时返回近卫局队伍。
messages.en: Officer Ch’en, Rhodes Island would like you to return to the Guard Bureau for now as well.

messages.zh: 这里毕竟是天灾残留的源石丛多生地段，对于健康人而言是很不利的。
messages.en: This is after all the originium-tufted regions left by the Calamity, it is really bad for healthy people.

messages.zh: 保护龙门，夺回密钥，当然是我们的任务——
messages.en: Protecting Lungmen, and retrieving the key, is our mission of course——

messages.zh: 但在我们来到这里的理由中，最重要的那个，是解救罗德岛的成员。
messages.en: But among the reasons we came here, the most important one, is to rescue Rhodes Island’s members.

messages.zh: 罗德岛不会放弃任何一个人。因此，罗德岛的作战方针也不会改变。
messages.en: Rhodes Island will not give up anyone. Thus, Rhodes Island’s tactics will not change as well.

messages.zh: 我会带队与你们汇合——在条件允许的情况下。
messages.en: I’ll join you with my team——when circumstances allow.

messages.zh: 陈长官！罗德岛可以让一支小队护送你——
messages.en: Officer Ch’en! Rhodes Island can let a squad escort you——

messages.zh: 我知道......罗德岛又要孤军奋战了。
messages.en: I know……Rhodes Island has to fight alone again.

messages.zh: 但现在可不是垂头丧气的时候。
messages.en: But now is not the time to feel downcast.

messages.zh: 毕竟，杰西卡还在等着我们。
messages.en: After all, Jessica is still waiting for us.
